options.Name: Version
options.Description: Don't change this. (Otherwise all your settings will be discarded)

options.Name: EnablePatch
options.Description: Whether the patch should be enabled.

options.Name: IgnoreGameCheck
options.Description: Don't change this unless you have a good reason to do so.

options.Name: ShowHeatValues
options.Description: Shows the current Heat value and drain timer during combat if set to true.

options.Name: UseOldPatch
options.Description: Whether to use the old (flawed) patch instead of the new one.

options.Name: DrainTimeMulti
options.Description:
Multiplies the time until Heat starts to drain on its own.
Set to 1 for Yakuza 3 Remastered (bugged/too fast) behavior.
Set to 2 for Yakuza 3 PS3 behavior.

options.Name: DisableHeatDrain
options.Description: Heat will never drain on its own if this is set to true. Heat loss by getting damaged or using a Heat move still applies though.

options.Name: InfiniteHeat
options.Description: Grants you infinite Heat if set to true.

options.Name: ZeroHeat
options.Description: Permanently sets your Heat to 0 (empty) if set to true. Will still allow you to charge up "Feel the Heat" like normal.
